review of my schedule so far. 1. capture

tuesday
1. the morning is actually really long. use it.
2. betwen 181 and dinner is actually an easily abused timesink. you have two hours. take a half hour break and start going. 
these two hours will be for cs22.

3. after orchie, one is usually very tired. try to finish all of 22 before hand. if not, sleep at 12 please.

wednesday

1. the morning is actually really long. use it.

these two hours will be for cs181.
